title: Former Paramount Co-CEO Brian Robbins Launching New Family Production Company; First Look Will Be At Sony Pictures
full_text: Former Paramount Co-CEO Brian Robbins Launching New Family Production Company; First Look Will Be At Sony Pictures. We have confirmed that former Paramount co-CEO Brian Robbins is launching a new family production company dedicated to animated and live-action fare. CAA, a handful of financiers and Sony are backing it, however, the latter is only a minority investor. The to….
